All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BusinessCommand
A representation of a business command that contains an ExagonCommand and other additional information, as stepIdentifiers and qualifiers.
BusinessException
Exception thrown when Exagon or business logic encounters a problem related with business.
BusinessStatus
A representation of a command execution result and its current step identifier.
DiameterStackConfiguration
An Exagon stack configuration specific for the Diameter protocol.

Exagon
ExagonChoreographyController
An ExagonChoreographyController is a class that maps all events and a command for a certain method.
ExagonCollection
Annotation used in entities for microservices.
ExagonCommand
An annotation used to mark objects as Exagon commands that are exchanged between microservices in a Saga.
ExagonCommandHandler
An annotation to register a method that waits for the availability of subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications, to start processing.
ExagonCommandQualifier
Enumeration of the command qualifiers supported by Exagon.
ExagonController
An annotation to identify classes with ExagonCommandHandler methods for processing subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications.
ExagonEntity
Base class for Entity on a @ExagonCollection.
ExagonEntityEvent
ExagonEntityEvent represents the base class used to save data on EventEnvelope.
ExagonEntityID
Represents the ID for ExagonEntity and ExagonEntityEvent.
ExagonExternalProtocolReply
Deprecated. 
ExagonInternalReply
Deprecated. 
ExagonInternalRequest
 
ExagonNotification
An annotation used to mark objects as Exagon notifications that are exchanged between microservices in a Saga.
ExagonOrderBy
 
ExagonOrderEnum
 
ExagonProtocolEnum
Class with the enumeration of all available communication technologies by the Exagon framework.
ExagonProtocolMapperController
An annotation to identify classes with ExagonCommandHandler methods for processing subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications.
ExagonQuery
 
ExagonRepository
 
ExagonRepositoryQuery
 
ExagonRollbackCommand
 
ExagonRuleExecutorException

Class that extends Info.
HTTPStackConfiguration
An Exagon stack configuration specific for the HTTP protocol.
HTTPStackConfiguration.Endpoints
 
IExagon
A specification of the Exagon core module used in a microservice startup phase to set up and startup Exagon.
IExagonAsyncConsumerConfigurator
Interface used to start/stop an async consumer.
IExagonCommandReply
A specification of a command result that also contains a network reply.
IExagonCommandResult
A specification of a command result.
IExagonCreationRepository<S extends ExagonEntity>
 
IExagonDuplicateControlHandler
An extensible specification used to enrich the ExagonInternalRequest with methods relevant for Exagon's Duplicate Control Manager (DCM).
IExagonExternalServer
A representation of an external server to which internal requests can be sent and replies received.

IExagonGenericReadWriteRepository<T extends ExagonEntity>

IExagonLocalRepository<S extends ExagonEntity>
 
IExagonMapToExternalMessages
Interface used in results/notifications of microservices.
IExagonProtocolMapperInbound
A specification for classes that represent an Exagon protocol mapper for inbound flows in the system.
IExagonProtocolMapperOutbound
A specification for classes that represent an Exagon protocol mapper for outbound flows in the system.
IExagonReadOnlyRepository<T extends ExagonEntity>
 
IExagonReadWriteRepository<T extends ExagonEntity>
 
IExagonSessionValidityHandler
An extensible specification used to enrich the ExagonInternalRequest with methods relevant for Exagon's Zombie Session Manager (ZSM).
IExagonSynthesisMapper
Interface used in Exagon-Mongo-Lib For use in EventHandler, when the information needed is a subset of class ExagonEntity defined in IExagonReadOnlyRepository
IExagonWorkFlow
A specification of an Exagon workflow that contains the logic of a Saga flow.

Class used to pass info about an event to be produced.
InfraException
Exception thrown when Exagon infra encounters a problem.

An Exagon stack configuration specific for the Kafka protocol.

RepositoryException
Base Exception thrown on exagon-mongo-lib operations
RepositoryParameterException
Exception thrown if parameters passed to exagon-mongo-lib read and write ops are incorrect or missing Extends from BusinessException, error derived from BLs not Exagon
RequestTypeAndSessionId
Class used to transport information about request type and session ID.
RequestTypeEnum
Type of the requests.
Rule
Generic entity of rule.
RuleEntityEvent
Class of the Event that transports a Rule entity
StackConfiguration
An abstract Exagon stack configuration that represents a server and its channels, i.e., the mechanisms created by the server for the organization and transmission of messages (topics, peers, paths, depending on the protocol used).
StackEvent
The Exagon's generic external representation of a network event (request or reply).
